original: 啟稟大人，<color=#fff999>$leader1</color>婉拒了我軍招募，勢必是計策被看穿，妾身真是無地自容。(<color=#bceea7>招募失敗</color>)
text: Enlightenment, <color=#fff999>$leader1</color> declined the recruitment of our army, it is bound to be seen through the strategy, the concubine is really embarrassed. (<color=#bceea7>Recruitment failed</color>)
